hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.filePath // empty'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(env|pem|key)$|credentials|secrets|\.env\.' 2>/dev/null; then echo 'BLOCK: Refusing to modify sensitive file: '"$file_path" >&2; exit 2; fi
hooks.description: Block edits to sensitive files (.env, .pem, .key, credentials, secrets)

hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.filePath // empty'); if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.py$' 2>/dev/null; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && uv run ruff format --quiet "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; uv run ruff check --fix --quiet "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
hooks.description: Auto-format and lint Python files with ruff after edits
